abstract: Brian Carman, who helped write hit song Pipeline for the surf band the Chantays while still a high school student in early 1960s, dies at age 69.
lead_paragraph: As a member of the Chantays, Mr. Carman helped write the instrumental hit “Pipeline.”

headline.main: Brian Carman, Surf Rocker, Dies at 69
headline.print_headline: Brian Carman, 69, a Writer of the Instrumental Surf-Rock Hit ‘Pipeline’

snippet: As a member of the Chantays, Mr. Carman helped write the instrumental hit “Pipeline.”
